DocumentName.description: Title or Name of the document in which the FEKL was found

DocumentLocation.description: path to the original PDF document in the machine

DocumentLocationJson.description: path to the document after conversion (Structured Json document from which the FEKLS were extracted)

ObjectType.description: The name of the Object Type. This field is filled when the item introduces a new object type

FEKLStatement.description: The Fact Engine Knowledge Language statement

PageNumber.description: The page number of the FEKL in the PDF document

LineNumber.description: The line number of the FEKL in the given page in the PDF document

SectionId.description: The number of the section that contains the FEKL. Retrievable from the structure Json document

SectionName.description: The Name or Title of said section

RequirementId.description: The id of the requirement if the FEKL was found in a requirement

StartOffset.description: the character offset which starts the segment containing the FEKL within the lowest-level section or requirement

EndOffset.description: the character offset which ends the segment containing the FEKL within the lowest-level section or requirement
